textBox.richText: The Kick-Off Workshop of the Swiss Center for Biometrics Research and Testing ( http://www.biometrics-center.ch ) hosted by Idiap presented two instruments: a cooperative research environment and the BEAT platform (www.beat-eu.org/platform). More than 50 persons attended the Kick-off Workshop including research institutions, companies and organisations that expressed their strong interest in these instruments. The program of the workshop can be found here: http://www.biometrics-center.ch/kickoff-workshop/kickoff-program
Kick-Off Workshop of the Swiss Center for Biometrics Research and Testing
